info.title: SalesAPI
info.summary: Sales REST API for managing customers, products, orders, and sales data.
info.description: A RESTful API for the Sales POC application. Provides CRUD operations for customers, products, sales orders, order items, and sales representatives, as well as read-only access to aggregated sales facts.

post.description: Sends a question to the AI chat endpoint and returns a response.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all customers.
Retrieves a single customer by their unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing customer by their unique identifier.

delete.description: Deletes a customer by their unique identifier.

get.description: Retrieves a single order item by its unique identifier.

delete.description: Deletes an order item by its unique identifier.

get.description: Retrieves all order items for a given order.

Retrieves a single product by its unique identifier.

delete.description: Deletes a product by its unique identifier.

get.description: Retrieves all products in a given category.
Retrieves all aggregated sales fact records.

get.description: Retrieves sales facts filtered by customer name.

get.description: Retrieves sales facts filtered by product name.
